name: Island Survival (itch)
description:
This was developed in under 72 hours during the 50th minijam.  That is why many mechanics are not polished and there are no sounds..

How to Play

You are stranded on a tiny island and your only desire is to survive. Gather ressources and craft materials in order
to get food and something to quench your thirst.
You can move by using the W, A,S, D keys or the arrow keys,
You can look around by using your mouse.

Gather Ressources by using [F].
Open or close your Inventory with [E] and craft items.

If you sprint with Left-Shift you get exhausted , hungry and thirsty.

Harvest bushes to get berries in order to decrease your hunger and thirst.
You can also bake bread in a campfire or convert sea water into drinking water
.

Open the Options Menu with Escape to adjust the graphic settings.

Have fun
